default: a {@filter simple weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon} and a set of {@item artisan's tools|phb} of your choice
(a) a {@item studded leather armor|phb} or (b) a {@item scale mail|phb}
a {@item light crossbow|phb} and 20 {@item crossbow bolt|phb|bolts}
Two {@item tinker's tools|phb} and a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb}

classFeature.name: Infusions
entries: 你已经学会了用你独特的魔法给物品注入能量，制造出奇妙的物品。在1级时，你可以从本职业末尾列表中选择两个{@filter Infusions|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLAART:INF}。制造师表格中的"已掌握的灌输"栏显示了你何时学会更多你选择的灌输。
在一次长休结束时，只要你有工匠工具，你可以用你选择的另一个（Infusion）替换你已知的一个（Infusion），只要你符合它的所有先决条件。

entries.name: Infusing an Object
entries: 在一次长休结束时，你可以使用你的工匠工具将你所知道的一种（Infusion）灌注到一个非魔法物品中。要做到这一点，你必须能够用你的工具触碰这个物品。
如果该灌注物品需要认定，你可以在灌注时立即认定该物品，或者你可以放弃认定，以便另一个生物可以认定它。要稍后认定灌注的物品，你必须遵循正常的认定流程。
灌注物品会永久存在。如果你死亡，那么在过去的天数等于你的智力修正值的天数之后（最少1天），灌注会消失。如果你放弃某个灌注的知识以学习另一个，或者将灌注注入另一个物品，灌注会立即消失。
你可以在每次长休结束时给多个物品灌注能量，每次最多一个对应你所掌握的每个（Infusion）(%num%)。每个（Infusion）(%num%)一次只能在一个物品上，而且一个物品不能承载多个（Infusion）(%num%)。如果你将（Infusion）(%num%)转移到一个新物品上，之前的（Infusion）(%num%)立即结束。

entries.name: Replicate Magic Item
entries: You can also use your Infusions to replicate magic items you have studied. During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using tinker's tools to examine a magic item you touch. At the end of that long rest, you can replace one Infusion you know with the knowledge of this magic item. After which, you can infuse an object with the properties of that magic item, following all the rules for your other Infusions.
You cannot use this feature to replicate magic items that are consumed after one use, such as scrolls and potions.

You can use this feature to replicate any item of Common rarity. As you gain Artificer levels you can use this feature to replicate items of increasing rarity: Uncommon at 5th level, Rare at 11th level, and finally Very Rare items at 17th level.

classFeature.name: Magical Tinker
entries: Your insights into magical and mechanical objects can appear as magic to the untrained eye. Starting from 1st level, you can use tinker's tools to cast the mending Cantrip and both detect magic and identify as rituals. Your tools are the spellcasting focus and replace the material components of the spells.
Moreover, the time it would take you to craft a magic item is halved if you are proficient with appropriate artisan's tools.

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: 在2级时，你可以利用你的工具和独特的魔法，从你赋予奥术力量的物品和工具中产生奇异而奇妙的法术效果。

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: 在2级时，你可以从{@filter Artificer spell list|spells|class=Alternate Artificer (LLAART)}中选择学习两个零度法术。在4级时，你可以学习另一个(%Artificer%)法术，而在10级时可以学习另一个。

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: Artificer（制造师）表格显示你有多少法术位来施放1级及更高级别的法术。要施放一个法术，你必须消耗一个等同于该法术等级或更高级别的法术位。当你完成一次长休后，你会恢复所有已消耗的法术位。
例如，如果你知道1级法术{@spell magic missile}，并且有一个1级和一个2级法术位可用，你可以使用任一法术位施放{@spell magic missile}。

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-level and Higher
entries: 你可以选择{@filter Artificer spell list|spells|class=Alternate Artificer (LLAART)}中的两个1级法术。制造师表中的"已知法术"栏显示了你学会更多制造师法术的时间。每个法术必须符合你拥有法术位的等级。例如，当你在这个职业中达到5级时，你可以学会一个新的1级或2级制造师法术。
当你在这个职业中获得一个等级时，你可以用你有法术位的另一个工匠法术来替换你已知的一个工匠法术。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 智力是你的铸师法术的施法能力，你利用奥术知识施放法术。当一个法术提到你的施法能力时，当你为一个铸师法术设定豁免 DC，或者当你进行一个铸师法术的法术攻击检定时，你使用你的智力。

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: 你必须使用你熟练的工匠工具、一套{@item artisan's tools|phb}或者一个带有你的附魔之一的物品作为你的造物师法术的施法焦点。
当你使用你的工匠工具时，你会知道{@spell mending}法术和{@spell identify}法术，但它们不计入你已知法术的数量。你可以使用你的工匠工具消耗一个法术位来施展辨识法术，或者作为仪式法术。

classFeature.name: Specialization
entries: 在1级时，选择以下最能代表你工匠的奥术研究和发明的专长之一：炼金术士 (Alchemist)，铠甲师 (Armorer)，战斗铁匠 (Battle Smith)，铸造师 (Forgewright)，或者魔杖使者 (Wandslinger)，每个专长的详细信息在职业末尾有介绍。
你的专长在1级时获得特性，然后在达到该职业的3级、5级、9级和15级时再次获得特性。

classFeature.name: Specialization Feature
entries: 在3级时，你获得了你的专长(Specialization)赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Arcane Recharge
entries: Starting at 3rd level, during the course of a short rest, you can recover expended spell slots of a combined level equal to your Intelligence modifier. After you do, you must complete a long rest before you can use this feature again.
At 11th level, you can use this feature to cause one Infused item or magic item you touch to regain any Charges it would normally regain at dawn, in place of regaining spell slots.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到4级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与正常规则一样，使用此特性不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Specialization Feature
entries: 在5级时，你获得了你的专长(Specialization)赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Flash of Genius
entries: You can offer potent insight at a moment's notice. Starting at 6th level, when you or a creature who can hear you within 30 feet, makes an ability check or saving throw, you can use your reaction to add your Intelligence modifier to that roll.
你可以使用这个特性的次数等于你的智力调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休后，你会恢复所有已用次数。

classFeature.name: Expert Tinker
entries: There are few who match your skill with mechanical magics. Starting at 7th level, you add double your proficiency bonus to any ability check you make with any tool you are proficient in.
Your expertise also allows you to infuse magic items with Infusions. However, you cannot increase bonuses above +3.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与常规规则相同，使用此特性不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Magic Item Mastery (4)
entries: You have gained a deep understanding of the inner workings of magic items, allowing you greater use of them. Starting at 9th level, you can attune to up to four magic items at once.
The number of magic items you can attune to at one time increases again at 14th level (5), and finally at 18th level (6).

classFeature.name: Specialization Feature
entries: At 10th level, you gain a feature granted by your Specialization.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与通常一样，使用这个特性不能将一个能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Tinker's Insight
entries: Also at 2nd level, your expert understanding of the magic of artifice allows you to bypass normal magic item restrictions. You can attune to and use any magic item regardless of any alignment, class, player race, or spell requirements, and you can choose to use your Artificer Spell save DC in place of the magic item's DC.

classFeature.name: Magic Item Mastery (5)
entries: You have gained a deep understanding of the inner workings of magic items, allowing you greater use of them. Starting at 13th level, you can attune to up to five magic items at once.

classFeature.name: Specialization Feature
entries: 在15级时，你获得了你的专长(Specialization)赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与常规规则相同，使用此特性不能将能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Magic Item Mastery (6)
entries: 你已经对魔法物品的内在运作有了深入的理解，使你能更好地利用它们。从18级开始，你可以同时激活多达六个魔法物品。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以选择将一个能力值提高2点，或者将两个能力值提高1点。与正常规则一样，你不能通过这个特性将一个能力值提高到20以上。
如果你的DM允许使用专长(feats)，你可以选择取一个{@5etools feat|feats.html}。

classFeature.name: Masterwork Inventions
entries: You imbue a fraction of your own soul into your Infusions and other magic items you use. At 20th level, you gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws for each magic item you are attuned to.
In addition, if you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can instantly end your attunement to one magic item or Infusion, causing you to drop to 1 hit point instead.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist
entries: 炼金术是一门精细的艺术，如果成分的比例偏离太远，效果可能会灾难性。炼金术士擅长将异国成分结合在一起，制造各种材料和效果。从可以在瞬间治愈伤口的治疗药剂，到与火焰接触时会爆炸的粘稠黏液。有了正确的成分和一点运气，炼金术士使用他们神奇的万灵药来赋予盟友生命，从敌人身上吸取生命。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with alchemist's supplies. If you are already proficient with alchemist's supplies, you instead gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Alchemist Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Alchemical Elixirs
entries: As your knowledge of alchemy grows, you learn to craft potent Elixirs that mimic the effects of powerful spells:

entries.name: Elixir Infusion
entries: As an Alchemist, you have access to an exclusive list of Infusions known, as {@filter Elixir Infusions|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLAART:ALC}. At 3rd level, and again at 5th, 9th, 13th, and 17th levels, your number of Infusions Known increases by 1, but these bonus Infusions must all be selected from the list of Elixir Infusions included at the end of this Specialization's description.

entries.name: Creating an Elixir
entries: During each long rest, you can spend 1 hour using alchemist's supplies to create individual Tiny vials that contain one copy of each Elixir you know, without expending a spell slot. An Elixir produces its spell at its lowest level, and all effects of the Elixir are chosen when it is created. Your Elixirs become inert and unusable at the end of your next long rest.

As an action, you can use alchemist's supplies to craft one vial of one Elixir you know by expending the spell slot listed in the Elixir Infusion's description. An Elixir can be used as part of the action you create it.

For example, if you learn Create Minor Elixir and choose grease and sleep, at the end of each long rest you prepare one elixir of grease, and one elixir of sleep. Creatures can then use these Elixirs to produce the spell effect. You can also use an action at any time to expend a 1st-level spell slot and create one additional elixir of grease or elixir of sleep.

entries.name: Using an Elixir
entries: Any creature can take the Use an Object action to drink one of your Elixirs, administer one to a target within its reach, or throw an Elixir at a point it can see within 30 feet. When thrown, an Elixir produces its spell effect at its point of impact. Elixirs use your Artificer Spellcasting Ability.

entries.name: Concentration
entries: If an Elixir produces a spell that requires concentration, it does not require concentration, but instead only lasts for three rounds (or fewer if dispelled). If a creature drinks an Elixir it can concentrate on the spell as normal.

subclassFeature.name: Potent Potions
entries: The reagents included in your Elixirs increase their potency. Whenever an Elixir crafted by you or an Artificer spell cast by you deals acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage, or it restores a creature's hit points, you can add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to one of the damage or healing rolls.

subclassFeature.name: Restorative Reagents
entries: You include revitalizing additives in every Elixir you concoct. Whenever a creature willingly drinks one of your Elixirs, it also gains temporary hit points equal to your Artificer level.

subclassFeature.name: Master Alchemist
entries: You have become a master amongst Alchemist Artificers. You are immune to any effects produced by any Elixir you crafted unless you wish to be affected by that Elixir.
Finally, you can take the Use an Object action as a bonus action on your turn, and when you do so, you can expend a spell slot to create an Elixir as part of that bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Armorer
entries: 在所有艺术师可以追求的专业中，铠甲师是最注重防御的。专注于成为魔法和金属的堡垒，铠甲师修改一套盔甲，使其成为他们的第二层皮肤。他们通过这套盔甲聚焦他们的标志性魔法，释放强大的攻击力并产生强大的奥术防御。铠甲师将他们的盔甲视为身体的延伸，随着他们不断完善他们的魔法能力，发明家和盔甲融为一体。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: 你获得{@item smith's tools|phb}和{@filter heavy armor|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=heavy armor}的熟练。如果你已经熟练使用铁匠工具，那么你可以选择另外一组{@item artisan's tools|phb}来获得熟练。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Armor
entries: Your research has led to the crafting of a set of armor infused with your signature arcane magic. It uses the rules below:

entries.name: Creating the Armor
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to modify one set of armor you touch, transforming it into Arcane Armor. You can only have one set of Arcane Armor at a time, and only you can use it. Crafting another set causes previous Arcane Armor to lose its power.

entries.name: Wearing the Armor
entries: Your Arcane Armor expands to cover your entire body, replacing missing limbs and body parts. You can don or doff your Arcane Armor as an action, and you can deploy or retract its helmet with a bonus action. If the armor normally has a Strength requirement, you can ignore it. Your Arcane Armor also cannot be removed against your will.

entries.name: Defensive Ward
entries: While wearing your Arcane Armor, you can use a bonus action to grant yourself temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of 1). These temporary hit points disappear if you doff your armor.

entries.name: Thunder Gauntlets
entries: The Arcane Armor includes powerful Thunder Gauntlets which cover your hands and can be used as a spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells. Your Thunder Gauntlets are simple weapons that deal 1d8 thunder damage on hit, and you can use your Strength or Intelligence for their attack and damage rolls. You can also hold and interact with objects and tools as normal with your Thunder Gauntlets.
Any creature that you hit with a Thunder Gauntlet attack has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other then you until the beginning of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Armorer Spells
entries: 从1级开始，当你达到该职业的特定等级时，你将学会额外的法术，如《伊夫利提魔法》表所示。这个法术对你来说算作一种铸师法术，但不会计入你已知的铸师法术数量。当你获得一个铸师等级时，这些法术不能被替换。

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action. Also, when you use your action to cast a spell, you can make a Thunder Gauntlet attack as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Modular Armor
entries: Your Arcane Armor now counts as multiple individual items for the purposes of your Infusions: armor (chest piece), boots, helmet, and its Thunder Gauntlets (two individual weapons or gauntlets). Each of these items can bear one Infusion.

subclassFeature.name: Armorer Adept
entries: You have greatly improved your Arcane Armor's synergy with your signature artifice. Your total number of Infusions Known increases by 2, but both of these additional Infusion must be applied to pieces of your Arcane Armor.
You gain another one of these bonus Infusions at 15th level.

subclassFeature.name: Master Armorer
entries: You have become a master of Armorer artifice. While wearing your Arcane Armor your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.
Finally, your Thunder Gauntlets deal 2d8 damage on hit.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Smith
entries: 护卫者和医疗员的结合，战斗铁匠（Battle Smith）是在保护他人和修复物资以及人员方面的专家。为了帮助他们的工作，战斗铁匠构建和修改他们的钢铁防御者（Steel Defender），一个独一无二的伙伴。

entries.subclassFeature: Tools of the Trade|Alternate Artificer|LLAART|Battle Smith|LLAART|3

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with smith's tools and in heavy armor. If you are proficient in smith's tools, you gain proficiency in another set of artisan's tools of your choice.

Moreover, when another creature within 5 feet of you is targeted by an attack, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the triggering attack roll. Though, you must be wielding a shield or a melee weapon to use this reaction.

subclassFeature.name: Steel Defender
entries: You have created for yourself a faithful construct, known as a Steel Defender. It is friendly to you obeys your commands. Its game statistics are found in the Steel Defender stat block on the next page, which uses your Spell save DC and proficiency bonus (PB). Your Steel Defender uses the rules below:

entries.name: Creating the Defender
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to create a Steel Defender. You can only have one Steel Defender, and creating another destroys the previous Steel Defender. If your Steel Defender dies, you expend a spell slot and spend 1 minute repairing it with your smith's tools, restoring it to life with its maximum hit points.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Steel Defender can bear one Infusion that is meant for boots, a cloak, gauntlet, helmet, or suit of armor.

entries.name: Combat
entries: In combat, your Steel Defender acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the Dodge action on its turn unless you use your bonus action to order it to take an action in its stat block, or another action. If you are incapacitated, the Steel Defender can act on its own to defend you to the best of its abilities.

entries.name: Model
entries: Upon creation, you choose a model for your Steel Defender; Humanoid or Quadruped, which determines it's appearance and capabilities both in and out of combat:

items: {@creature Steel Defender (Humanoid)|LLAART|Humanoid}. Your Steel Defender resembles a Medium humanoid creature. It is proficient with shields, and it has humanoid hands that it can use to perform simple tasks.

{@creature Steel Defender (Quadruped)|LLAART|Quadruped}. Your Steel Defender resembles a Large beast of your choice. It's walking speed increases by 10 feet, and it can be ridden by you as if it were a trained mount.

subclassFeature.name: Battle Smith Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

rows: {@spell circle of power}, {@spell mass cure wounds}

subclassFeature.name: Minor Upgrade
entries: 你已经提升了你的钢铁防御者的进攻能力。选择以下其中一个小型升级：

entries.name: Minor Arcanum
entries: You imbue your Steel Defender with a 1st-level Artificer spell of your choice with a casting time of one action. As a bonus action, you can order the Defender to cast that spell at 1st-level, using your spellcasting modifier.
The Steel Defender has three Charges of this spell, and it regains all Charges when it finishes a short or long rest.

entries.name: Martial Offense
entries: 你的钢铁防御者的撕裂伤害变为1d10，当你命令它执行撕裂动作时，它可以进行两次撕裂攻击而不是一次。它可以用抓取或推挤替换任一次撕裂攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Modular Defender
entries: Your Steel Defender now counts as multiple individual items for the purposes of Infusions: its torso (armor or cloak), legs (boots), head (helmet), and the limbs it uses for Rend attacks (gauntlet or melee weapon). Each item can bear one Infusion.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Upgrade
entries: 你可以赋予你的钢铁防御者神奇的能力和特性。选择以下的一个强化升级之一：

entries.name: Greater Arcanum
entries: You imbue your Steel Defender with a 2nd-level Artificer spell of your choice with a casting time of one action. As a bonus action, you can order your Defender to cast the imbued spell at 2nd-level, using your spellcasting modifier.
The Steel Defender has three Charges of this spell, and it regains all Charges when it finishes a short or long rest.

entries.name: Limited Sentience
entries: You improve the cognitive abilities of your Steel Defender. Its Intelligence score becomes 10, and it can speak, read, and write one language of your choice.
It will also carry out simple instructions you give it until they are complete. Examples include 'bring me that object
attack that creature', or 'let nothing through this door'.

entries.name: Reinforced Plating
entries: You greatly improve its defenses. It is resistant to all bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

subclassFeature.name: Masterwork Upgrade
entries: 你赋予你的钢铁护卫者神奇的能力和力量。选择以下的大师级升级之一：

entries.name: Arcane Ward
entries: 在距离你的钢铁防御者 15 英尺范围内的生物对来自法术的伤害具有抗性。

entries.name: Self-Destruct
entries: You embed a powerful arcane explosive in your Steel Defender. As a bonus action, you can order your Steel Defender to self-destruct, destroying itself and forcing all creatures within 30 feet to make a Dexterity saving throw.

Creatures take force damage equal to the Steel Defender's remaining Hit Dice on a failure (maximum of 10d8), and half on a success. Once this feature is used, your Steel Defender cannot be rebuilt until the end of your next long rest.

entries.name: Major Arcanum
entries: You imbue your Steel Defender with a 3rd-level Artificer spell of your choice with a casting time of one action. As a bonus action, you can order the Defender to cast that spell at 3rd-level, using your spellcasting modifier.
The Steel Defender has three Charges of this spell, and it regains all Charges when it finishes a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Forgewright
entries: 虽然大多数制造者主要是发明家，他们选择冒险生活是为了在实地测试实验，但那些被称为锻造大师的人则是为了战斗而战。他们沉浸在战斗的刺激中，将创新与战士技能相结合，锻造出他们标志性的奥术武器。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: 你获得{@filter martial weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}和{@item smith's tools|phb}的熟练。如果你已经熟练使用铁匠工具，那么你可以选择另外一组{@item artisan's tools|phb}来获得熟练。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Armament
entries: Your battlefield research has resulted in the invention of your signature Arcane Armament, which uses the following rules:

entries.name: Forging the Armament
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to reforge one melee weapon that you are holding into an Arcane Armament. You can only have one Arcane Armament at a time, and forging another causes any previous Armaments to revert to their normal state.

entries.name: Properties
entries: When you are wielding the Arcane Armament it counts as a magical weapon, and you can use Intelligence, in place of Strength or Dexterity, for attack and damage rolls. It also gains the Thrown (20/60) property, and after you make a thrown attack with it, it instantly returns to your hand. Last, it can be used as a Spellcasting focus for Artificer spells.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Arcane Armament can bear one Infusion, even though it is a magic weapon. Your number of Infusions Known also increases by 1, but this bonus Infusion must be applied to your Arcane Armament.

subclassFeature.name: Forgewright Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Jolt
entries: 当你用你的奥术武器击中目标时，你可以消耗一个法术位对目标造成额外的力量伤害。额外伤害为1级法术位为2d6，每高一级增加1d6，最高为6d6。

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a spell, you can make an Arcane Armament attack as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Surge
entries: The magic of your Arcane Armament empowers its strikes. Whenever you hit with an Arcane Armament attack you can deal a bonus 1d8 force damage on hit. Each time you attack with your Arcane Armament, you can forgo this potential bonus damage to instead make your attack with advantage.

subclassFeature.name: Master Forgewright
entries: You have become a master Forgewright and can extend the power of your Arcane Armament to others. As a bonus action, you can flood a number of weapons equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1) within 30 feet, one of which can be your Arcane Armament, with raw power. For 1 minute, these weapons deal a bonus 1d8 force damage on hit.
Once you use this feature you must finish a long rest before you can use it again. If you have no uses left, you can expend a spell slot of 3rd-level or higher to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Wandslinger
entries: 魔杖使们利用他们的聪明才智和艺术头脑来打造奇妙的奥术武器。虽然他们在灵活性和微妙性方面有所欠缺，但却以压倒性的奥术火力弥补了这一点。魔杖使们以他们标志性的奥术副武器而闻名。对于一些人来说，这些是精美雕刻的魔杖或法杖，而对于其他人来说，它们是精心制作的符文铁炮。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: 你获得{@item woodcarver's tools|phb}的熟练加值。如果你已经熟练使用木雕刀具，那么你可以选择另一组{@item artisan's tools|phb}来获得熟练加值。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Sidearm
entries: Your research has resulted in the creation of a Wandslinger's signature Arcane Sidearm, which uses the following rules:

entries.name: Crafting your Sidearm
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour crafting an Arcane Sidearm using woodcarver's tools. You can only have one Arcane Sidearm, and crafting another causes previous Arcane Sidearms to lose their power.

entries.name: Appearance
entries: An Arcane Sidearm is a Tiny object that can be used as a spellcasting focus for Artificer spells. You choose its appearance, though this has no effect on its abilities. Many Wandslingers craft Sidearms that resemble delicate wands of wood, ornate meticallic rods, or even runic iron cannons.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Arcane Sidearm can bear a single Infusion that is meant for an arcane focus.

subclassFeature.name: Wandslinger Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

rows: {@spell cone of cold}, {@spell wall of force (alternate)|llspell}

subclassFeature.name: Spell Slinger
entries: As an action, you can use the Arcane Sidearm to produce one of the effects below using your Artificer spellcasting ability:

entries.name: Arcane Lance
entries: You make a ranged spell attack against one target that you can see within 120 feet. On hit, it takes force damage equal to 1d10 + your Intelligence modifier.

entries.name: Shocking Burst
entries: You conjure a burst of lightning at a point you can see within 60 feet, forcing creatures within 5 feet to make a Dexterity saving throw. Creatures take 2d6 lightning damage on a failed save, and half as much on a success.

entries.name: Thunderous Blast
entries: You emit a blast of thunderous force in an adjacent 15-foot cone, forcing creatures within to make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, they are knocked back 10 feet in a straight line and take 2d6 thunder damage.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Duelist
entries: You wield your Arcane Sidearm with deadly skill. Whenever you use a Spell Slinger action, you can produce two effects from your Arcane Sidearm instead of one. These effects can target multiple targets or the same target.
The number of Spell Slinger effects you can produce from your Arcane Sidearm with a single action increases again at certain Artificer levels: at 10th level (3) and 15th level (4).
Also, when you use your action to cast an Artificer spell, you can produce one Spell Slinger effect as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Quickdraw
entries: You add your proficiency bonus to initiative rolls, and when you roll initiative and aren't surprised or incapacitated, you can use your reaction to use one Spell Slinger effect.

subclassFeature.name: Master Wandslinger
entries: Your skill with your Arcane Sidearm marks you as a master amongst Wandslingers. You gain the benefits listed below:

items: When you or another creature you can see within 30 feet is targeted by a spell or magical effect, you can grant it three-quarters cover against the effect as a reaction.
You have advantage on {@spell counterspell} ability checks.
When you deal damage with a Spell Slinger effect or Artificer spell, you can cause it to deal force damage.

subclassFeature.name: Aeronaut
entries: 一位铸师可以追求的最危险的专长是飞行家(Aeronaut)。这些开拓性的头脑不断进行危险的试验，追求机械飞行，他们不惜一切来完成完美的飞行器。任何挫折或伤害都无法消减真正飞行家的斗志。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: 你获得{@item woodcarver's tools|phb}的熟练加值。如果你已经熟练使用木雕刀具，那么你可以选择另一组{@item artisan's tools|phb}来获得熟练加值。

subclassFeature.name: Aeronaut Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Flying Machine
entries: You have constructed your signature Flying Machine which marks you as an Aeronaut Artificer. It uses the rules below:

entries.name: Creating the Machine
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using woodcarver's tools to craft one Flying Machine. You can only have one Flying Machine at a time, and only you can use it. Crafting another causes the previous to fall apart.

entries.name: Appearance
entries: You determine the appearance of your Flying Machine, but this has no effect on its abilities. Some include canvas wings, rotating blades, or even elemental engines.

entries.name: Wearing the Machine
entries: Your Flying Machine can be worn over clothing or light armor. While wearing it, it can be used as a spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells, and it grants you a flying speed of 20 feet and allows you to hover.
At certain Artificer levels, this flying speed increases: at 5th level (30 feet), 10th level (45 feet), and 15th level (60 feet).

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Flying Machine can bear a single Infusion meant for an arcane focus, boots, cloak, or tiny object.

subclassFeature.name: Aerial Maneuvers
entries: Your Flying Machine helps you to move with wondrous grace. When you are wearing your Flying Machine, you gain a bonus to all Dexterity ability checks and saving throws equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1).

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a spell, you can make a weapon attack as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Airborne Assault
entries: Your Flying Machine allows you to attack from unorthodox positions, catching enemies unaware. Whenever you make a ranged attack while flying at least 10 feet off the ground, the attack deals a bonus 1d8 damage on hit. You can forgo this bonus damage to instead make the attack with advantage.

subclassFeature.name: Master Aeronaut
entries: You are a master Aeronaut, making expert use of your Flying Machine's maneuvering capability. While wearing your Flying Machine, you can take the Dash action as a bonus action.

Moreover, when you are forced to make a Dexterity saving throw to take half damage while you are wearing your Flying Machine, you instead take no damage if you succeed on your saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

subclassFeature.name: Archivist
entries: 几个世纪以来，编年史学家们一直在寻找存储大量信息的最佳方式。虽然大多数人满足于卷轴，但档案保管员们却追求更高境界。在他们的研究中，他们学会了将整个图书馆的信息存储在物体中，唤醒了第一批人工智能。与这些奇妙的智慧合作，档案保管员们驾驭着这些神秘智慧的无限力量，推动他们的研究向前发展。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency in calligrapher's supplies. If you are already proficient in calligrapher's supplies, you instead gain proficiency in one set of artisan's tools of your choice.
In addition, you can speak, read, and write two additional languages of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Artificial Mind
entries: You have learned to awaken wondrous Artificial Minds within mundane objects, which use the rules detailed below:

entries.name: Awakening the Mind
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using calligrapher's supplies to awaken a Mind in a Tiny object you touch. The object is magical if it was not already, and it counts as a spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells. Awakening a second Mind destroys the previous Mind.

entries.name: Magical Telephony
entries: 你可以与携带你注能物品的任何生物进行心灵感应，范围为1英里。这些生物也可以通过心灵感应进行回应。

entries.name: Bonus Skills
entries: Depending on the material of the object you awaken, you gain proficiency in two corresponding skills:

subclassFeature.name: Archivist Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Information Overload
entries: As an action, the Mind bombards one creature you can see within 30 feet, forcing it to make an Intelligence saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failure, it takes 1d8 psychic damage and has disadvantage on the first attack roll it makes before the start of your next turn.
At certain Artificer levels, this psychic damage increases: at 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

subclassFeature.name: Acute Overload
entries: The power of your Artificial Mind has grown, increasing its power against foes. If a creature fails its saving throw against Information Overload you can expend one spell slot to deal bonus psychic damage. This bonus is 2d8 for a 1st-level slot, and an additional 1d8 for each slot level higher than 1st.
Also, whenever you deal psychic damage with Information Overload or a spell cast through your Artificial Mind, you add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to the damage.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Consciousness
entries: Your Artificial Mind lends you its mental capacity. When you are forced to make a Wisdom or a Charisma saving throw, or a Constitution saving throw to maintain your concentration, you add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to your roll, so long as you are holding your Artificial Mind.

subclassFeature.name: Master Archivist
entries: You have become a master of Archivist artifice. As a bonus action, you can transform into pure information and teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 60 feet, or to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of an object bearing one of your Infusions, so long as it is the same plane of existence.

Finally, when you cast an Artificer spell, you can choose for your Artificial Mind to concentrate on it for you, allowing you to concentrate on another spell. However, both spells must be Artificer spells, and their total level cannot exceed 5th-level.
If you make a saving throw to maintain concentration on two spells, you make one saving throw for both spells, but you do not gain the benefits from Improved Consciousness.

subclassFeature.name: Biomancer
entries: 虽然大多数制造者满足于机械发明，但有些人将生物学，即生物科学，视为充满潜力的领域。生物术士是那些利用他们的才能来补充自己的解剖学并创造生命的人。结合了死灵术和变形魔法，生物术士将所有生物视为可以通过魔法进化的原型。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Evolution
entries: You use your knowledge of arcane biology to forcefully evolve living beings, using the rules detailed below:

entries.name: Modifying your Flesh
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using a set of leatherworker's tools to modify your body with two {@filter Modifications|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLAART:BioM} from the list on the following page. These Modifications last until you replace them during a long rest.

entries.name: Prerequisites
entries: If a Modification has a prerequisite Artificer level, you can modify yourself with it when you meet that level.

entries.name: Additional Modifications
entries: At certain levels in this class, you can modify yourself with more Modifications at once: at 5th level (3), 10th level (4), and finally when you reach 15th level (5).

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency in leatherworker's tools and Medicine. If you are already proficient with leatherworker's tools, you instead gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools.

subclassFeature.name: Biomancer Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Biomancer's Homunculus
entries: You can use the magic of your artifice to create a facsimile of life. You learn the Homunculus Servant Infusion, but it doesn't count against your total number of Infusions Known. However, you replace the required gem with 1 pound of organic matter, and the creature type of your Homunculus changes to a monstrosity.

Your Homunculus can heal others by grafting its flesh over wounds. As a bonus action, you order your Homunculus to touch a creature, sacrifice any number of its remaining hit points, restoring the same amount of hit points to the target.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: 当你在你的回合使用攻击动作时，你可以攻击两次，而不是一次。此外，你可以在其中一次攻击的位置施放你的工匠(cantrips)法术之一。

subclassFeature.name: Violent Regrowth
entries: You can use your arcane knowledge to forcefully rearrange your biology. As a bonus action, you can expend a spell slot to replace one of your Modifications with another Modification.
In addition, your walking speed also increases by 10 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Monstrous Homunculus
entries: You have improved the process of creating your Homunculus. When you create a Homunculus Servant, you can choose for it to be Tiny, Small, or Medium in size, and it gains a single Modification of your choice without a level prerequisite.
At 15th level, your Homunculus' Modification can be any Modification with a prerequisite of 5th-level or lower.

subclassFeature.name: Master Biomancer
entries: You have become a master of arcane biology. Whenever you target a creature with one of your Biomancer Spells, you can grant one target of that spell temporary hit points equal to your Artificer level + your Intelligence modifier.
Finally, during a long rest, you can forgo one of your own Modifications to instead use leatherworker's tools to modify one willing creature of your choice who you touch.

subclassFeature.name: Chronothief
entries: 对于那些追求机巧魔法的人来说，没有任何研究领域是太危险的。也许违背他们的良知，一些工匠选择尝试时空魔法，即时间魔法。被称为时空窃贼，这些大胆的工匠以他们标志性的(Chronometers)为特征，这是一件神奇的物品，他们用它来窃取时刻并调整时间流逝。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with jeweler's tools. If you are already proficient in jeweler's tools, you instead gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools.
In addition, you are always aware of the exact time on your home plane of existence. Once you spend a day on another plane you gain this benefit there as well.

subclassFeature.name: Chronometer
entries: You have learned to construct a wondrous device that marks you as a Chronothief. This device uses the rules below:

entries.name: Creating the Chronometer
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using jewler's tools to craft a Chonometer. It is a Tiny object resembling a timekeeping device of your choice, and it can be used as a spellcasting focus for Artificer spells.
你一次只能拥有一个计时器，再创建第二个会导致第一个的魔法立即解除。

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Chronometer can bear one Infusion that is meant to be imbued in an arcane focus, ring, or diadem.

entries.name: Abilities
entries: While you are holding your Chronometer, you can use an action to use one of the abilities below targeting a creature you can see within 60 feet. All of the Chronometer's abilities use your Artificer spellcasting and Spell save DC:

rows: You increase the creature's speed by a number of feet equal to 5 times your Intelligence modifier (minimum 5 feet) until the beginning of your next turn.
You force a creature to make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, its speed is 0 until the start of your next turn.
You force a creature to make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, it switches places with you. It can choose to fail.

subclassFeature.name: Chronothief Spells
entries: You learn certain spells at the Artificer levels noted in the table below. These do not count against your total number of Spells Known and cannot be switched upon gaining a level.
If your table uses Explorer's Guide to Wildemount, you can replace these spells with Dunamancy spells of the same level.

subclassFeature.name: Efficient Chronomancy
entries: Your understanding and control over time magic allows you to use your Chronometer more efficiently. When you use your action to use a Chronometer ability, you can use two abilities instead of one. They can be the same ability or different, and you can target multiple creatures or the same creature.
Your Chronometer also gains the abilities detailed below:

rows: You force a creature to make a Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it takes 2d6 necrotic damage and ages by 1 day.
As a reaction, you add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to the initiative roll of a creature in range, or to yourself.
When a target in range makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to force it to re-roll the d20.

subclassFeature.name: Time Transfer
entries: When a creature fails its saving throw against Decelerate, you can use Accelerate on another creature in range as part of the same action. Moreover, when a creature fails it's saving throw against Age, you can grant another creature in range temporary hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

subclassFeature.name: Master Chronothief
entries: You have mastered the wondrous magic stored within your Chronometer. As an action, you can use your Chronometer to cast the {@spell time stop} spell. Once you cast time stop in this way, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
Starting at 17th level, you can expend a 5th-level spell slot to use your Chronometer to cast time stop this way again.

subclassFeature.name: Composer
entries: 在每一位伟大的音乐家背后，每一次起立鼓掌，每一场售罄的音乐会，往往都有作曲家(Composer)将羽毛笔放在羊皮纸上，谱写音符。这些伟大的思想家与其他吟游诗人和表演者不同，作曲家以更理性的方式对待音乐。他们是模式和重复的大师，当他们将分析思维应用于问题时，只是时间的问题，他们就会找到解决方案。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with smith's tools and in Performance. If you are already proficient with smith's tools, you instead gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Musical Apparatus
entries: You have designed a wondrous musical instrument unique to you, your Musical Apparatus, which uses the following rules:

entries.name: Crafting the Apparatus
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to create your Musical Apparatus. You can only have one Apparatus, and crafting another causes the previous Apparatus to lose its magic.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Apparatus can bear a single Infusion meant for a musical instrument or arcane focus.

entries.name: Abilities
entries: Your Apparatus is a musical instrument that only you are proficient with, and it can be used as the spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells.

While you are wielding the Musical Apparatus you can cast the thunderclap* Cantrip, so long as you use your Apparatus as a spellcasting focus. You can use an action on your turn to produce one of the effects below with your Apparatus:

entries.name: Raucous Blast
entries: You make a ranged spell attack against a creature that can hear you within 60 feet. On hit, it takes 1d10 thunder damage and the target is deafened until the beginning of your following turn.

entries.name: Ringing Strike
entries: You make a melee spell attack against a target you can see within 5 feet. On hit, the target takes thunder damage equal to 1d10 + your Intelligence modifier. If you hold our Apparatus with two hands, the d10 becomes a d12.

subclassFeature.name: Composer Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Combat Virtuoso
entries: Whenever you use your action to produce a Raucous Blast or Ringing Strike with your Apparatus, you can produce two of those effects. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a spell, you can produce one of those effects as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Thunderous Note
entries: Whenever you deal thunder damage with your Apparatus you can expend a spell slot to knock the target back with a burst of thunderous sound. It is knocked back 10 feet for a 1st-level slot, plus another 10 feet for each slot level above 1st. This distance is halved for each size the target is above Large.

subclassFeature.name: Resonant Frequency
entries: As an action, you can play a note on your Apparatus to cause a number of creatures of your choice (up to your Intelligence modifier) within 30 feet of you to resonate with undetectable vibrations for 1 hour. The next time one of these creatures is hit by a melee attack, its attacker takes 2d8 thunder damage and cannot take reactions until the start of its next turn.
你可以使用这个特性的次数等于你的智力调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休后，你恢复所有已用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Master Composer
entries: You have mastered the theory and applications of musical artifice, a true virtuoso. You gain the following benefits:

items: 你对雷电伤害和失聪免疫。
The knock-back distance of Thunderous Note is doubled.
The damage of Resonant Frequency increases to 4d8.
If you spend at least 1 minute practicing with a musical instrument, you gain proficiency with that instrument.

subclassFeature.name: Dungeoneer
entries: 虽然大多数制造师专注于开发单一发明，地牢探险者(Dungeoneers)则利用他们的聪明才智将平凡之物武装化。他们利用基本的冒险装备来构建防御陷阱、谜题和建筑，可以击退除了最顽强的冒险者和怪物之外的所有人。地牢探险者将踏上冒险之旅，分析守护古墓和神庙的陷阱。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency in both carpenter's tools and mason's tools. If you are already proficient with either set of tools, you instead gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools of your choice.
此外，你获得了对即兴武器的熟练，并且可以使用你的智力代替力量或敏捷属性进行所有即兴武器的攻击和伤害骰投。地牢探险者以制作用冒险用品制成的奇特武器而闻名。

subclassFeature.name: Dungeoneer Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

rows: {@spell glyph of warding}, {@spell leomund's tiny hut}
{@spell guardian of faith}, {@spell otiluke's resilient sphere}

subclassFeature.name: Dungeoncraft
entries: You are a master at dungeoneering, and use your knowledge to craft Dungeoncraft Objects, using the following rules:

entries.name: Crafting Dungeoncraft Objects
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using carpenter's tools to craft a number of the Dungeoncraft Objects from the table equal to twice your Intelligence modifier (minimum 2). These objects appear as non-magical, but turn to ash at the end of your next long rest.
You can also craft normal versions of Dungeoncraft Objects in one-quarter of the normal time and for half the usual cost.

entries.name: Abilities
entries: The Objects can be used as a spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells, and if one of these Objects forces a creature to make a saving throw, it uses your Spell save DC.

entries.name: Using your Objects
entries: You can take the Use an Object action as a bonus action, but you must use a Dungeoncraft Object.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Dungeoncraft Objects can bear one Infusion for an item that it could be used as an improvised version of.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. Moreover, you can take the Use an Object action in place of one or both of these attacks.
Finally, damage dealt by your Dungeoncraft Objects counts as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Improvisation
entries: You have a unique way of making things work. When you cast a Dungeoneer Spell, you can replace the material component with a Dungeoncraft Object in place of expending a spell slot, but this Dungeoncraft Object is consumed by the spell.
You can cast each Dungeoncraft Spell this way once, then you must complete a long rest before you can do so again.

subclassFeature.name: Master Dungeoneer
entries: You are a deadly master of dungeon design. You can spend 10 minutes using mason's tools to produce the effect of {@spell passwall} or {@spell wall of stone} without expending a spell slot. When you cast the spells in this way, they do not require your concentration, but the structures turn to ash at the following dawn.
Finally, creatures have disadvantage on all saving throws made to resist the effects your Dungeoncraft Objects.

subclassFeature.name: Gunslinger
entries: You have dedicated your great intellect to the development of a one-of-a-kind weapon of war, the Arcane Firearm. Marked by this signature weapon, you enter the fray with the swagger and guile only found in one kind of Artificer, the Gunslinger.

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with alchemist's supplies and smith's tools. If you are already proficient with these tools, you gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Gunslinger Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Firearm
entries: Your groundbreaking research has led to the development of your signature Arcane Firearm, which uses the rules below:

entries.name: Crafting your Firearm
entries: During the course of a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to craft one Arcane Firearm. It is only usable by you, and crafting another causes the magic of the previous Firearm to instantly dispel.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Your Arcane Firearm is a martial weapon you are proficient with. It has the ranged (80/320) and loading properties, it deals 1d10 force damage on hit, and you can use your Intelligence, in place of Dexterity for its attack and damage rolls. Finally, you can use it as a spellcasting focus for Artificer spells.

entries.name: Using your Objects
entries: You can take the Use an Object action as a bonus action, but you must use a Dungeoncraft Object.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Firearm can bear one Infusion for a ranged weapon, metal rod, or Tiny object.

entries.name: Upgrades
entries: Upon creation, your Arcane Firearm gains two {@filter Upgrades|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLAART:GunU} of your choice from the list of Upgrades at the end of this Specialization.
At certain Artificer levels, your Arcane Firearm gains more Upgrades: at 5th level (3), 10th level (4), and finally at 15th level (5).

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one Arcane Firearm attack as a bonus action on that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Increased Capacity
entries: You have improved your Firearm for efficient use in combat. You ignore the Loading property of your Arcane Firearm, but you must use your bonus action to reload it. You can make up to six attacks with your Firearm before you must reload.

subclassFeature.name: Overcharge
entries: You can imbue your Arcane Firearm's attacks with additional explosive magic. Once per turn when you hit a target with an attack from your Arcane Firearm, you can expend a spell slot to cause that attack to deal bonus force damage to the target.
This bonus damage is 2d6 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus an additional 1d6 force damage for each slot level above 1st.

subclassFeature.name: Quickdraw
entries: You always seem to shoot first. You can add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to your initiative rolls. Also, if you roll initiative and are not surprised or incapacitated, you can use a reaction to make one attack with your Arcane Firearm.

subclassFeature.name: Master Gunslinger
entries: Your skill with your Arcane Firearm is nearly supernatural in battle. You can use a bonus action on your turn to steady your breathing, granting you advantage on any attacks you make with your Arcane Firearm until the end of your current turn.

Finally, once per turn when you make an attack with your Arcane Firearm with advantage, you can forgo the advantage to instead make one additional Arcane Firearm attack. You cannot gain advantage on this bonus attack.

subclassFeature.name: Enhanced
entries: 在大多数制造者开发出神奇力量的物品时，那些被称为强化者的人通过改造自己的身体来发挥他们的伟大智慧。他们用奥术增强物品替换和改进自己的肢体，永远努力创造一个更完美的自我。强化者以他们令人印象深刻且致命的战斗增强物品而闻名。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with leatherworker's and smith's tools. If you are already proficient with these tools, you instead gain proficiency with a set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Hidden Blade
entries: You have modified one of your arms with a Hidden Blade that can be extended or retracted as a bonus action. This Hidden Blade is a simple weapon with the finesse property, and on hit, it deals 1d10 piercing or slashing damage.
Your Hidden Blade is considered a magical weapon, but it can still bear one of your Infusions. It can also be used as the spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells when extended.

subclassFeature.name: Modular Physique
entries: You can improved your physical form with mechanical and arcane enhancements. Your body itself counts as individual items for the purposes of Infusions: your head (helmet), torso (armor), arms (gauntlets), and legs (boots). Each of these body parts can bear one Infusion.

These modifications have also hardened your exterior. If you are not wearing armor, your Armor Class is equal to 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Intelligence modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit, and any Infusions incorporated into your torso benefit this AC.

subclassFeature.name: Enhanced Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Enhancements
entries: You find it easier to innovate and invent when working with your own body. Your number of Infusions Known increases by 1, but this bonus Infusion must be applied to part of your body with your Modular Physique feature.

Your total number of Infusions Known increases by 1 again at 10th and 15th level, but both of these additional Infusions must also be applied to part of your body with your Modular Physique feature as well.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action. Also, when you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one Hidden Blade attack as a bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Streamlined Integration
entries: Your modifications perform better than the original parts. For each part of your body (including your Hidden Blade) bearing an Infusion you gain a +1 bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution-based ability checks (maximum of +5), and your walking speed increases by 5 feet (maximum of 25 feet).
The damage of your Hidden Blade also increases to 2d10.

subclassFeature.name: Master Enhanced
entries: You have finally achieved the goal of all Enhanced Artificers, ascension beyond your mortality. You gain the benefits below:

items: You are considered both Humanoid and Construct.

You no longer need to eat, sleep, or breathe, and you no longer age. To gain the benefits of a long rest you must perform four hours of mechanical maintenance on yourself or your body will fall into disrepair.
You are resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

subclassFeature.name: Junker
entries: Junker Artificers specialize in the creation of hulking constructs known as Rigs. Climbing inside of their signature Rig, these Artificers lay waste to any foes who stand against them and tower over their allies. Junkers set out on the path of adventure to push their Rig to its limits in an effort to endlessly improve upon its design.

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with smith's tools and land vehicles. If you are already proficient in smith's tools you instead gain proficiency in a set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Junker Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Junker's Rig
entries: Your mechanical research has led to the construction of your {@creature Rig|LLAART|Rig}. The Rig's game statistics are found in the Rig stat block, which uses your Proficiency Bonus (PB), your Artificer Spell save DC, and your Intelligence modifier (INT). You determine your Rig's appearance, and it uses the rules detailed below:

entries.name: Constructing your Rig
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to construct your Rig. You can only have one Rig at a time. Crafting another causes any previous Rigs to fall into disrepair and become totally unusable.
You can use tinker's or smith's tools to repair any damage to your Rig. For every 10 minutes you spend on repairs, your Rig regains hit points equal to your Artificer level.

entries.name: Piloting your Rig
entries: As a bonus action, a Medium or smaller creature can climb into your Rig so long as it is within 5 feet. While inside, it is considered its Pilot. The Rig's Pilot cannot be targeted by attacks, spells, or other abilities, and they use the Rig's stat block. The Rig can be used as the spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells while you are its Pilot.

The Pilot can exit the Rig as a bonus action, reappearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet. If your Rig is reduced to 0 hit points it is destroyed, the Pilot is ejected, and lands prone in an unoccupied space within 5 feet. If your Rig is destroyed, you can spend 1 hour, which can be during a short rest, using smith's tools to restore your Rig to its maximum hit points.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Rig can bear one Infusion meant for a suit of armor, gauntlets, boots, helmet, or a melee weapon.

entries.name: Collapsible Rig
entries: While your Rig is a Large Construct, you have designed it to be collapsible for ease of transport. As a bonus action, you can collapse, or expand, your Rig. While it is collapsed, the Rig can be worn as a backpack. However, its wearer must have a Strength of 13 or it is encumbered.

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. Moreover, if you use your action to cast a spell, you can make one Arcane Firearm attack as a bonus action on that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Modular Rig
entries: Your Junker now counts as multiple individual items for your Infusions: its armor (torso), boots (legs), helmet (head), and the limbs it uses for Slam (melee weapon or gauntlet). Each of these individual items can bear one of your Infusions.

subclassFeature.name: Hulking Strikes
entries: The power of your Rig knocks foes off their feet. When your Rig hits a target equal to its size or smaller with its Slam, it can choose to knock it back 10 feet in a straight line, where it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall prone.

subclassFeature.name: Master Junker
entries: You have improved your Rig so that it rivals the great titans of legend, marking you as a master of Junker artifice. Your Rig now uses the {@creature Titanic Rig|LLAART|Titanic Rig} stat block.

subclassFeature.name: Machinist
entries: 虽然一些制造者花费一生完善一个孤独的创作，机械师（Machinist）制造者更看重数量而非质量。他们以创造标志性的自动人偶（Automatons）而闻名，这些小型发条人形机器人被创造出来用于单一但临时的目的。拿着他们的工具，和一支奇特而神奇的仆人军团，机械师们准备好迎接任何挑战。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: 你获得{@item smith's tools|phb}的熟练。如果你已经熟练使用铁匠工具，那么你可以选择另一组{@item artisan's tools|phb}来获得熟练。

subclassFeature.name: Automatons
entries: You learned to craft uniquely specialized mechanical servants known as {@creature Automaton|LLAART|Automaton}. Your Automatons use the rules below:

entries.name: Crafting Automatons
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using smith's tools to create a number of Automatons equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1). They are inactive and are easily carried or worn until activated by you.
Your Automatons use the Automaton stat block, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) and Intelligence modifier (INT).

As an action, you can use smith's tools and expend a spell slot to create an inactive Automaton. However, the maximum number of Automatons you can have at one time equals your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1). Creating an Automaton while at your maximum causes the oldest to be destroyed.

entries.name: Model
entries: Whenever you craft an Automaton, you choose its {@filter Model from the list|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLAART:AutoM} at the end of this Specialization. Its Model determines its main ability. Once chosen it can't be changed.

entries.name: Combat
entries: As a bonus action, you can activate an Automaton and throw it to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 ft. While active, your Automaton acts during your turn. It does nothing unless you use your bonus action to order it to move up to its speed and make a Slam attack or to use the action determined by its Model. Automatons cannot use the normal actions available to other creatures, only the actions detailed by its Model or a Slam attack. You can order an Automaton to use its Model action or to make a Slam attack as part of the same bonus action that you use to activate it.

Your Automaton remains active for 1 hour, or until you use an action to touch it and deactivate it, or it is destroyed. You can only have one Automaton active. If you activate a second Automaton, the first instantly deactivates in its space.

subclassFeature.name: Machinist Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

rows: {@spell cloud of daggers}, {@spell cordon of arrows (alternate)|llspell}

subclassFeature.name: Automated Army
entries: Your ability to control your signature Automatons has greatly increased. You can have two Automatons active at once, and you can use a single bonus action to order both Automatons to move and use the action determined by their Model.
When you reach 15th level in this class, you can have up to three Automatons active at once, and you can issue orders to all three Automatons with a single bonus action.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Designs
entries: Your ability to design complex constructs has grown. When you create an Automaton it gains the benefits of two{@filter Models|optionalfeatures|feature type=LLAART:AutoM} of your choice from the list at the end of this Specialization.
Moreover, your Automaton's attacks count as magical for the sake of overcoming resistances and immunities.

subclassFeature.name: Efficient Construction
entries: Your signature magic provides quantity of Automatons over quality. When you expend a spell slot to create an Automaton, you create a number of inactive Automatons equal to the level of the spell slot you expended. You cannot use this feature to surpass the limit on your total number of Automatons.

subclassFeature.name: Master Machinist
entries: You are a master Machinist and have become but one among many with your army of Automatons. When you are forced to make a saving throw or are hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to instantly switch places with an active Automaton within 60 feet, causing that Automaton to become the target of the triggering effect or attack.
Finally, your Automatons are resistant to all non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

subclassFeature.name: Puppeteer
entries: 尽管所有的工匠都有他们的怪癖，操纵者(Puppeteers)往往是奇怪的奇术发明者的一个子集。他们将研究和智慧专注于通过他们的操纵线(Marionette Strings)来控制其他生物。这些奇怪的工匠经常被发现在幕后拉动线，他们更喜欢增强他们的盟友，而不是冒险置身于前线。

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with weaver's tools and Sleight of Hand. If you are already proficient with weaver's tools, you gain proficiency with another set of artisan's tools.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Strings
entries: You have learned to craft your signature spool of Arcane Strings which use the rules detailed here:

entries.name: Crafting the Spool
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using weaver's tools to craft a spool of Arcane Strings. It is a Tiny spool of thread you can wield as a whip, you are proficient with it, and it can be a spellcasting focus for Artificer spells.

You can only have one spool of Arcane Strings, and creating a second spool of Strings causes the magic of the previous spool to be instantly dispelled. Only you can wield your Arcane Strings in this way.

entries.name: Infusions
entries: Your Arcane Strings are always infused with the Wondrous Whip Infusion, but this doesn't count against your total number of Infusions Known, and it cannot be replaced.

entries.name: Abilities
entries: While wielding your spool of Arcane Strings, you gain the features below, which can target any willing creature you can see within 30 feet. When you use these abilities, your Arcane Strings fly out and attach to your target, then return.

rows: If a creature misses with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to have it repeat its attack against the same target.
If a creature makes an ability check with a skill you are proficient in, you can add your Intelligence modifier to its roll as a reaction
As a bonus action, you move the attached creature up to half its walking speed. This does not provoke opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Puppeteer Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Skillful Strings
entries: The magic and your skill with your Arcane Strings grows. You gain the following additional Arcane String features:

entries.name: Channel
entries: You cast a spell and have it originate from a target in range. If it requires concentration, you concentrate on it.

entries.name: Strike
entries: When a creature takes the Attack action, you can use a reaction to cause it to make one additional attack as part of its action.

subclassFeature.name: Nimble Fingers
entries: Your ability to manipulate others via your Arcane Strings is truly a marvel. You gain one additional reaction each round, but it can only be used to use an Arcane Strings ability. An effect can only trigger one of your reactions.
Additionally, the range of your Arcane Strings, and all of their abilities, increases to 60 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Master Puppeteer
entries: You are an unquestioned master Puppeteer. You can use your Arcane Strings to cast the {@spell Otto's Irresistible Dance} spell. Once you do so, you cannot cast it again until you finish a long rest.
Starting at 17th level, you can expend a 5th-level spell slot and use your Arcane Strings to cast {@spell Otto's Irresistible Dance} again.

subclassFeature.name: Mechanic
entries: Mechanics channel an overwhelming obsession with arcane motors to construct powerful mechanical vehicles. Marked by their unquenchable need for speed, these Artificers draw on their adventuring experiences to construct and improve on a wondrous Autocycle, their one-of-a-kind motorized invention.

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency with smith's tools and land vehicles. If you are already proficient with smith's tools or land vehicles you gain proficiency in a set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Roadster
entries: Your experience has given you special resilience against the hazards of your motorized inventions. You can't be knocked from a vehicle against your will while you are conscious.
In addition, once per turn when you take bludgeoning, fire, piercing, slashing, or thunder damage, you can use a reaction to reduce the damage you take by your Intelligence modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Autocycle
entries: Your obsession with motorized machinery has borne fruit in the construction of an Autocycle, which uses the rules below:

entries.name: Constructing your Autocycle
entries: During the course of a long rest, you can spend 1 hour with smith's tools to construct an Autocycle. It is a Medium vehicle with an appearance of your choice, but its appearance has no effect on its statistics. You can only have one Autocycle at a time. Constructing another causes the first to fall into disrepair and become unusable.
You can use tinker's or smith's tools to repair any damage to your Autocycle. For every 10 minutes you spend on repairs, your Autocycle regains hit points equal to your Artificer level.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Your Autocycle is a mount which can only be controlled by you. It uses the Autocycle stat block on the next page, which uses your Intelligence modifier (INT), proficiency bonus (PB), and Artificer Spell save DC. While riding it, it can be used as a spellcasting focus for your Artificer spells.

entries.name: Riding the Autocycle
entries: While mounted on the Autocycle, it acts during your turn, you use its speed instead of yours, and you can use an action to use the actions from its stat block. If a creature attacks your Autocycle while you are riding it, you can use a reaction to cause the attack to target you instead.

entries.name: Infusion
entries: Your Autocycle can bear one Infusion meant for boots (wheels), armor (chassis), or a melee weapon (ram).

subclassFeature.name: Mechanic Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Afterburn
entries: Once per turn, when you are riding your Autocycle and move within 5 feet of another creature, you can force it to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it takes fire damage equal to 1d10 + your Intelligence modifier and that creature cannot target you with an opportunity attack on this turn.
Your Autocycle can now bear up to two Medium creatures (or three Small creatures), and up to 100 lbs. of cargo.

subclassFeature.name: Expert Rider
entries: Your Autocycle and your ability to drive it have increased. You gain the following benefits while riding on your Autocycle:

items: Your Autocycle's movement ignores all difficult terrain.
Opportunity attacks against your Autocycle, or creatures riding on your Autocycle, are made with disadvantage.
When you cast an Artificer spell with a target of self, you can also grant your Autocycle the benefits of that spell.
When you move within 5 feet of a friendly creature, it can use its reaction to mount your Autocycle if there is room.

subclassFeature.name: Master Mechanic
entries: You are a master of arcane motorization, and have upgraded your Autocycle into a vehicle of mythic ability. Your Autocycle gains a flying speed equal to its walking speed and can hover. Creatures riding on your Autocycle also cannot be targeted by opportunity attacks while the Autocycle is moving.

Finally, the damage of your Afterburn feature increases to 2d10, and you can use it whenever you move past a creature on your turn. However, you can only force each creature to make this saving throw once per turn.

subclassFeature.name: Reanimator
entries: Most Artificers focus their creativity on mechanical or arcane inventions, but those known as Reanimators use their unique abilities to raise their defeated enemies as Thralls. Instead of improving themselves, they use necromantic artifice to make use of the abilities of their Thralls had in life, now in undeath.

subclassFeature.name: Tools of the Trade
entries: You gain proficiency in Nature and leatherworker's tools. If you are already proficient in leatherworker's tools, you gain proficiency with a set of artisan's tools of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Reanimated Thrall
entries: You use necromantic artifice to restore a facsimile of life to a slain foe, reanimating it as your Thrall, using the rules here:

entries.name: Reanimating a Thrall
entries: You can use leatherworker's tools to perform a 1-minute ritual on a creature you touch that has died within the last 8 hours. At the end of this ritual, it rises as your Thrall. You can only have one Thrall at a time, and if you raise another Thrall, any previous Thralls die instantly. Once a creature is reanimated as your Thrall, you cannot reanimate that creature as a Thrall again after it dies.

entries.name: Potential Thralls
entries: Your artifice only allows you to raise Beasts, Humanoids, and Monstrosities as your Thralls, and the strength of the creatures you can raise is limited by their Challenge Rating. You can raise one of the above creatures as your Thrall if the creature's Challenge Rating is equal to your Artificer level divided by three, rounded down.

entries.name: Thrall Statistics
entries: Your Thrall is mindless and follows you with absolute loyalty. It uses the stat block it had in life, but it gains the Undead creature type in addition to its type, it has no Hit Dice, and it gains no benefits from short or long rests. When you reanimate a creature as your Thrall, it is restored to full health and abilities as if it completed a long rest.

entries.name: Combat
entries: In combat, your Thrall acts on your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it will only take the Dodge action on its turn unless you use your bonus action to command it to take one of the actions from its stat block or another action. If you are incapacitated, your Thrall will act to defend you, but it will take no further actions.
If your Thrall has the ability to cast spells, you must expend one of your spell slots when you order it to cast one of its spells.

subclassFeature.name: Reanimator Spells
entries: 在下表中指定的魔法师等级时学会特定法术。这些法术不计入你已知法术的总数，并且在升级时不能更换。

subclassFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. Moreover, you can forgo one of these attacks to order your Thrall to make a single attack.

subclassFeature.name: Necrotic Preservation
entries: You can preserve the dead for later use. When you cast {@spell gentle repose} on a creature that you could raise as a Thrall, you can transform it into a small Trinket, which lasts for the duration.
At any point, you can use your Reanimated Thrall ritual on one of these Trinkets to raise that creature within as a Thrall.

subclassFeature.name: Advanced Reanimations
entries: You can raise some of the most powerful mortal creatures to serve you as Thralls. You can raise Aberrations, Dragons, and Giants as your Thralls, so long as the creatures are within the Challenge Rating limited detailed in Reanimated Thrall.

subclassFeature.name: Master Reanimator
entries: You can keep your Thralls alive so long as your power lasts. If your Thrall is reduced to 0 hit points but isn't killed outright, you can use your reaction to expend a spell slot. The Thrall is instead reduced to a number of hit points equal to 10 times the level of the spell slot.
This feature cannot cause a your Thrall to exceed its hit point maximum.

optionalfeature.name: Arm Launcher
entries: As an action, this magical launcher can be loaded with up to five Tiny objects, such as individual bags of ball bearings or caltrops, or vials of acid, alchemist's fire, oil, or holy water.
As a bonus action, the wearer can activate the launcher to fire one of the objects loaded in it, making a ranged weapon attack against a target or space it can see within 20 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Arcane Focus
entries: This magic item grants its wielder +1 bonus to spell attack rolls, and it ignores half cover when making spell attacks.
这个奖励在11级时增加 (+2)，在17级时增加 (+3)。

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Defense
entries: This magical item grants its wearer or wielder a +1 bonus to its Armor Class while wearing or wielding this infused item.
这个奖励在11级时增加 (+2)，在17级时增加 (+3)。

item: suit of armor or a shield

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Weapon
entries: This magic weapon grants its wielder a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls it makes with this infused weapon.
这个奖励在11级时增加 (+2)，在17级时增加 (+3)。

optionalfeature.name: Featherweight Belt
entries: When worn, this magic belt reduces its wearer to one-tenth of its weight without decreasing its physical abilities.
At 11th level, it reduces the wearer to one-hundredth of its weight without decreasing its physical abilities.

optionalfeature.name: Featherweight Weapon
entries: This magic weapon no longer has the heavy and two-handed properties if it had it. If it does not have either the heavy or two-handed property, it instead gains the light property.
At 11th level, this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

item: simple or martial melee weapon (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Goggles of Clearsight
entries: While wearing these magical goggles the wearer can see normally through light or heavy obscurement from mundane and magical phenomena, including darkness, within 120 feet.
The wearer also no longer suffers negative effects from the Sunlight Sensitivity trait, and it has advantage on any saving throws it makes to resist the blinded condition.

item: helm, pair of goggles, or glasses

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Cannon
entries: In place of an attack, the wielder of this magical object can make a ranged spell attack, using your Intelligence for the Spellcasting ability, against a target it can see within 60 feet. On hit, the target takes 2d6 lightning damage.

item: gauntlet, arcane focus, or metal rod

optionalfeature.name: Power Whip
entries: The damage die of this magic whip becomes a d10, and once per turn when the wielder hits a Large or smaller target with a Power Whip attack, they can force it to make a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
At 11th level, this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Repeating Shot
entries: 这件魔法武器会忽略装填属性，如果它有的话。如果你没有往武器里装填弹药，它会自行产生，当你进行远程攻击时制造魔法弹药。这些弹药在击中或未击中目标后会消失。
At 11th level, this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus becomes +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Returning Weapon
entries: This magical weapon immediately flies back to the hand of its wielder after they make a thrown weapon attack with it.
在11级时，这把武器使其攻击和伤害骰获得+1的奖励。在17级时，这个奖励增加到+2。

optionalfeature.name: Gem of Warding
entries: As an action, the wielder of this magical gem can expend one of its Charges and throw it to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet, where it hovers 5 feet above the ground. Once placed, the wielder can use a bonus action to cause the gem to move up to 20 feet, or to emit a pulse granting creatures of the wielder's choice within 10 feet of the gem temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

This magic gem has a number of hit points equal to your Artificer level and an Armor Class equal to your Intelligence score. It is active for 1 minute, or until it is destroyed, after which it returns to its wielder.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: gem worth at least 100 gold to serve as its core

optionalfeature.name: Homing Weapon
entries: 这件魔法武器的使用者在以该武器的远程射程进行攻击时，可以忽略所施加的劣势。
At 11th level this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

item: weapon with the ranged or thrown property

optionalfeature.name: Homunculus Servant
entries: Your experimentation has yielded you a loyal {@creature Homunculus Servant|LLAART|Homunculus Servant}. You determine its appearance, but this has no effect on its abilities. It is friendly to you, and it obeys your orders. It uses the Homunculus Servant stat block on this page, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) in several places.

entries.name: Creating the Homunculus
entries: During a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using tinker's tools to create a Homunculus. You can only have one Homunculus. If you create another the previous turns to ash. If your Homunculus dies, you expend a spell slot and spend 1 minute repairing it with your tinker's tools, restoring it to life with its maximum hit points. If you die, your Homunculus turns to ash after 1 minute.

entries.name: Combat
entries: In combat, your Homunculus acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the Dodge action on its turn unless you use your bonus action to order it to take an action in its stat block, or another action. If you are incapacitated, your Homunculus can act on its own and will defend its master to the best of its abilities.

item: gem worth at least 100 gold to serve as its core

optionalfeature.name: Immovable Boots
entries: If the wearer is standing on a flat surface, it can use an action to activate the boots, fixing itself in place with magic. Until it uses an action to deactivate the boots, they do not move, even if they are defying gravity. To move the boots and their wearer, a creature must succeed on a DC 30 Strength check.

optionalfeature.name: Infiltrator Armor
entries: This magic suit of armor retains its weight but is formfitting and wearable under clothes without detection. It also grants its wearer advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
At 11th level, this armor grants its wearer a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Light Blade
entries: While it is grasping this magical object, the wielder can use a bonus action to cause a blade of pure radiance to spring into existence, or disappear, from this object. While it exists, this magic item emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet beyond that radius. This luminous blade is considered a simple melee weapon with the finesse property, and it deals 1d8 radiant damage on hit.
At 11th level, this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

item: sword hilt or arcane focus (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Mind Sharpener
entries: When the wearer of this magical object fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration, it can use a reaction to expend a Charge from this object to succeed instead.
