This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: helmet, diadem, suit of armor, or robes

optionalfeature.name: Minor Arcane Item
entries: You imbue this object with a minor amount of arcane power, choosing a 1st-level Artificer spell you know to infuse within. Any creature that holds this item can expend one Charge to cast the imbued spell with your Artificer spellcasting ability.
If the imbued spell requires concentration, the wielder of the item must concentrate on the spell for the duration.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: Tiny object, tool, or arcane focus (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Radiant Weapon
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，持有者可以让这把武器发出明亮的光，照亮30英尺半径范围内，并在30英尺之外散发微光。持有者可以作为一个奖励动作来熄灭这个光。

When the wielder hits a creature with this magic weapon, it can expend one Charge to force it to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is blinded until the beginning of the wielder's next turn.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
At 11th level, this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Repulsion Gauntlets
entries: When the wielder of these magical gauntlets hits a creature with an unarmed strike or gauntlet attack it can expend one Charge to force it to make a Strength saving throw. Large or larger creatures have advantage on this saving throw. On a failure, the target is knocked back 15 feet in a straight line.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
At 11th level, the gauntlets gain a +1 bonus to their attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

item: pair of gloves or gauntlets (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Repulsion Shield
entries: When the wielder of this magic shield is hit by a melee attack, it can expend one Charge to force the attacking creature to make a Strength saving throw. Large or larger creatures have advantage on this saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker is knocked back 15 feet in a straight line and falls prone.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
At 11th level, this magic shield grants a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This Armor Class bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Armor of Strength
entries: 这件魔法盔甲为穿戴者提供+1点护甲等级加值，穿戴者还可以使用其智力代替力量进行基于力量的能力检定或豁免投掷。
When the wearer of this armor would be knocked prone or moved against its will, it can expend one Charge to not move.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
在17级时，这件护甲会提供+2的护甲等级加值。

optionalfeature.name: Voyager Boots
entries: The wearer of these magical boots can use a bonus action to teleport up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
At 17th level, the wearer can use the boots to teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

optionalfeature.name: Chameleon Armor
entries: This magical armor grants its wearer a +1 bonus to its Armor Class. The wearer can use an action to expend Charges and cast one of the spells here on itself: disguise self (1 Charge), invisibility (2 Charges) or greater invisibility (4 Charges).
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
在17级时，这件护甲会提供+2的护甲等级加值。

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Weapon
entries: You infuse a melee weapon with elemental power, choosing acid, cold, fire, poison, or lighting, and a command word.

The wielder of this magic weapon can speak its command word to cause elemental power to wreathe the weapon until it speaks the command word again. For the duration, it deals a bonus 1d6 damage of the type you chose on hit.
在17级时，额外元素伤害增加为2d6。

optionalfeature.name: Greater Arcane Item
entries: You imbue this object with a greater amount of arcane power, choosing a 2nd-level Artificer spell you know to infuse within. Any creature that holds this item can expend one Charge to cast the imbued spell with your Artificer spellcasting ability.
If the imbued spell requires concentration, the wielder of the item must concentrate on the spell for the duration.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: Tiny object, tool, or arcane focus (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Helm of Awareness
entries: The wearer of this magic helm cannot be surprised unless it is incapacitated. It also adds your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to its initiative rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Armor
entries: This magical armor grants its wearer a +1 bonus to its Armor Class, and its wearer is resistant to your choice of either acid, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, radiant, or thunder.
At 17th level, this armor grants a +2 bonus to Armor Class, and you can infuse this magical armor so it grants the wearer resistance to psychic or force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Ring
entries: You infuse a ring with elemental power, choosing acid, cold, fire, poison, or lighting, and a command word.
When the wearer casts a spell of 3rd-level or lower that deals the chosen damage type, it can speak the command word to deal maximum damage to one target of the spell.
一旦佩戴者使用这枚戒指来最大化一个法术的伤害，直到第二天黎明之前都无法再次使用。
在17级时，它可以用于5级或更低级别的法术。

optionalfeature.name: Guardian Gauntlets
entries: When a creature ends its turn within 30 feet of the wearer of these magical gauntlets, the wearer can expend one Charge as a reaction to force it to make a Strength saving throw. Huge and larger creatures have advantage on this save. On a failure, it is pulled 30 feet toward the wearer to an unoccupied space of its choice. If it pulls the creature within 5 feet, the wearer can make a single melee weapon attack against it.
This magic item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Shield
entries: The wearer of this magic helm gains resistance to psychic damage, immunity to the charmed and frightened conditions, magic that would read its thoughts or dreams, and it cannot be targeted by telepathy unless it wishes to.

optionalfeature.name: Masterwork Arcane Item
entries: You imbue this object with your extraordinary arcane power, choosing a 3rd-level Artificer spell you know to infuse within. Any creature that holds this item can expend one Charge to cast the imbued spell with your Artificer spellcasting ability.
If the imbued spell requires concentration, the wielder of the item must concentrate on the spell for the duration.
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: Tiny object, tool, or arcane focus (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Masterwork Homunculus
entries: You have discovered the secrets to the creation of life. You learn the {@spell clone} spell. It counts as an Artificer spell for you, but it doesn't count against your total number of Spells Known. You can cast clone without expending a spell slot as long as you have the material components available. Your clone only takes 12 days to reach maturity, but you can only have one.
如果在你的克隆体成熟之前的任何时候替换这个（Infusion）（Infusion）,这个法术立即失败。

optionalfeature.name: Adjustable Tool Set
entries: 使用者被认为精通这套神奇的工具，当作为一个动作时，他们可以将这套工具转变成另一套他们选择的工匠工具。
在11级时，这个魔法工具套装会给予一个+1的能力检定加值。在17级时，这个加值会增加到+2。

item: a set of artisan's tools (requires attunement)

optionalfeature.name: Artificial Limb
entries: This magic prosthetic limb attaches to a creature, seamlessly covering one limb or replacing a lost limb. As a bonus action, the wearer can extend, or retract the limb up to 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Belt of Utility
entries: This magical belt has ten Tiny pockets which can each hold a Tiny or smaller object. As an action, bonus action, or as part of an attack, the wearer can call to mind one object in one of the pockets, instantly summoning it into its hand and can use it as part of that action, bonus action, or attack.
If the wearer does not have a free hand when it summons the object, it shunts one object it is holding into that pouch.

item: belt or vest with ten pockets

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Instrument
entries: The wielder is proficient with this magical instrument and can use it as a spellcasting focus for its spells. Whenever it makes an ability check using the instrument, it can add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to its roll.
At 11th level, this magical instrument grants its wielder a +1 bonus to its Spell save DC when used as a spellcasting focus. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Ring of Knowledge
entries: Upon Infusion, choose one skill, tool, or weapon that you are proficient with, or one language that you can speak, read, and write. The wearer of this magic ring is considered proficient in that chosen skill, tool, or weapon, or knows that language.

optionalfeature.name: Thought Blade
entries: This magical weapon translates the wielder's thoughts into physical movements, allowing it to wield it with its mind. It can use its Intelligence, in place of its Strength or Dexterity, for this magical weapon's attack and damage rolls.
At 11th level, this weapon gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Wondrous Translator
entries: The wearer of this magical object understands any language that it hears spoken aloud as if it were its native tongue.
At 5th level, this object does not require attunement, and at 11th level, the wearer can also speak any language it hears.

optionalfeature.name: Wondrous Whip
entries: The wielder of this magical object can use it to cast the {@spell thorn whip} Cantrip using the object as the material component of the spell, and your Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.

The wielder can choose for the spell to do 0 damage. If it does, it can pull a target smaller than it up to 30 feet closer, and can catch objects in a fre hand. If the target is larger than it, the wielder can pull itself up to 30 feet closer to the target.
At 11th level, this object gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: Many-Handed Pouch
entries: 这些魔法袋共享一个具有单个袋子容量的超维空间。伸手进入一个被灌注的袋子可以访问这个共享的存储空间。只要一个袋子在另一个袋子的100英里范围内，它就能运作；否则袋子是空的，不会接受任何内容。
如果灌注结束，存放在共享空间中的物品都会随机移动到其中一个袋子中。

item: individual pouches equal to your Intelligence modifier

optionalfeature.name: Ring of Potential
entries: While wearing this magical ring, the wearer can use a bonus action to expend its Charges and regain one expended spell slot equal to the number of Charges expended.
This magical ring has three Charges, and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Skittering Servant
entries: Your experimentation has created an arachnoid Skittering Servant. It is a Tiny mechanical construct with eight metallic legs. As an action, you can use your tinker's tools to attach (or remove) a single weapon or object to the Servant.

As an action, you can expend one of the Servant's Charges and throw it to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 ft. where it activates. While it is activated, you can use a bonus action to order the Servant to move up to 20 feet and use the object attached to it as if you were using it. The Servant can move up walls and difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without having to make an ability check.

The Servant has hit points equal to your Artificer level and Armor Class equal to your Intelligence score. It is active for up to 1 minute or until it is destroyed, then it deactivates, instantly returning to its wielder.
This magic Servant has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Skyfall Harness
entries: This magic harness has wing-like fins between its limbs that slow falls and allow its wearer to glide. When the wearer falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from its fall when calculating falling damage, and when it falls at least 10 feet, it can glide 2 feet horizontally every 1 foot that it falls.

optionalfeature.name: Wildfire Cannon
entries: As an action, the wielder of this magical object can expend Charges and use your Artificer Spellcasting modifier to cast these spells: {@spell firebolt} (0 Charges), {@spell burning hands} (1 Charge), {@spell scorching ray} (2 Charges), or {@spell fireball} (3 Charges).
This magical item has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: gauntlet, arcane focus, or metal rod

optionalfeature.name: Wall Shield
entries: As an action, the wielder can slam this magic shield into the ground, expending Charges to produce the effects of wall of stone centered on the shield, which remains in the ground. However, this effect only creates a number of panels equal to the Charges spent, it doesn't require concentration, and lasts for 1 minute. The wall is destroyed if the shield is removed.
This magical shield has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
At 11th level, this magic shield grants a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This Armor Class bonus increases to +2 at 17th level.

optionalfeature.name: War Gauntlet
entries: You attach a shield or martial weapon that can be wielded one-handed, or a shield, to this magical gauntlet. The wearer is proficient with the attached item, and the wearer cannot be disarmed of this item.
At 11th level this magic gauntlet grants a +1 bonus to Armor Class. This becomes a +2 bonus at 17th level.

item: armored gauntlet and a martial weapon or shield

optionalfeature.name: Collar of Taming
entries: When worn by a beast with a CR equal to or less than your Intelligence modifier, this magical collar allows the creature attuned to exert absolute control over that beast.

The collared beast is friendly to you and obeys your orders completely. In combat you share initiative and it acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the Dodge action unless you use a bonus action to order it to take an action from its stat block or another action. If you can ride the beast then it counts as a trained mount.
At 17th level, this magic collar can control mostrosities.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Prism
entries: This magical diamond is bonded to an arcane focus. When the wielder of this focus casts a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage to acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage.
At 17th level, this magic arcane focus grants its wielder a +1 bonus to its spell attack rolls and its Spell save DC.

item: diamond worth at least 50 gold and an arcane focus

optionalfeature.name: Levitating Weapon
entries: Upon Infusion, you choose a command word for this weapon. As a bonus action, the wielder can speak the magic weapon's command word, expending one of its Charges. When it does so, the weapon begins to hover in its space, and attacks one target of its choice within 5 feet, using your Intelligence, in place of the wielder's Strength or Dexterity, for its attack and damage rolls. While this magic weapon hovers, the wielder can attack with it using its bonus action on each turn.
This magical weapon remains active for 1 minute, or until the wielder speaks its command word again, at which point it returns to its wielder's empty hand, sheath, or belt.
This magical weapon has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Metamorphosis Armor
entries: As a bonus action, the wearer of this magical suit of armor can expend a Charge to cast enlarge/reduce, targeting itself, without expending a spell slot or requiring concentration.
This magical suit of armor has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.
At 17th level, the wearer can expend two Charges at one time to reduce or grow their size by two size categories.

optionalfeature.name: Vampiric Weapon
entries: When the wielder hits a creature with this weapon, it deals a bonus 1d6 necrotic damage on hit, and the wielder can gain temporary hit points equal to half that necrotic damage. This weapon has no effect against undead or constructs.
At 17th level, this bonus necrotic damage becomes 2d6.

optionalfeature.name: Astral Cannon
entries: In place of an attack, the wielder of this magical object can make a ranged spell attack against a target it can see within 60 feet. On hit, the target takes 2d10 force damage.

As an action, the wielder can expend one Charge to fire two dimensional motes at two unoccupied flat surfaces that it can see within 60 feet, creating one 5-foot by 5-foot portal that connects the two surfaces. This portal remains open for 1 minute, but it is closed early if five creatures pass through it, or if this Infusion is used to create another portal.
This magical object has a number of Charges equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1 Charge), and it regains all of its expended Charges each day at dawn.

item: gauntlet, arcane focus, or metal rod

optionalfeature.name: Boots of Destruction
entries: The wearer of these magical boots cannot be knocked prone or moved against its will. It also knows {@spell destructive wave}, and can cast destructive wave once without expending a spell slot.
The wearer of these magic boots regains the ability to cast the spell without expending a spell slot at the following dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Mystic Armament
entries: The wielder's attacks with this magic weapon score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20, and they can use the weapon as a spellcasting focus. It also knows the {@spell steel wind strike (alternate)|llspell} and can cast it once without expending a spell slot.
The wielder of this magic weapon regains the ability to cast the spell without expending a spell slot at the following dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Mystic Shot
entries: Item: ranged weapon (requires attunement) The wielder of this magic weapon can choose for any damage dealt by the weapon to be force damage, and it can be used as a spellcasting focus. They also know the {@spell swift quiver (alternate)|llspell} spell, and can cast it once without expending a spell slot.
The wielder of this magic weapon regains the ability to cast the spell without expending a spell slot at the following dawn.

optionalfeature.name: Create Minor Elixir
entries: 每次选择这个灌注时，从表格中选择两种灵丹效果进行学习。要制作额外的次要灵丹，你必须消耗一个1级或更高级别的法术位。

optionalfeature.name: Create Greater Elixir
entries: 每次选择这个灌注时，从表中选择一个(Infusion)魔药效果来学习。要制作额外的小型魔药，你必须消耗一个2级或更高级的法术位。

optionalfeature.name: Create Advanced Elixir
entries: 每次选择这个灌注时，从表中选择一个魔药效果来学习。要制造额外的次要魔药，你必须消耗一个3级或更高级的法术位。

optionalfeature.name: Create Expert Elixir
entries: 每次你选择这个灌注时，从表中选择一个魔药效果学习。要制作额外的次要魔药，你必须消耗一个4级或更高级的法术位。

optionalfeature.name: Create Masterwork Elixir
entries: 每次选择这个灌注时，从表中选择一个魔药效果学习。要制作额外的小魔药，你必须消耗一个5级或更高级的法术位。

optionalfeature.name: Amphibian Physiology
entries: Your neck sprouts gills or your skin becomes permeable like an amphibious creature. You gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and you can breathe both air and water.

optionalfeature.name: Bestial Senses
entries: Your eyes and ears resemble those of predators. When you make a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check based on your sense of hearing, sight, or smell, you add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to your roll.

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Physicality
entries: Your muscles and veins engorge with arcane power. When you make a Strength ability check or saving throw you can add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to your roll.

optionalfeature.name: Monstrous Claw
entries: You transform one of your limbs into a monstrous arm ending in a massive pincer. Your unarmed strikes with this claw deal slashing damage equal to 1d8 + your Strength modifier, and on hit, you can choose to automatically grapple your target if it is equal to your size or smaller.

optionalfeature.name: Resilient Hide
entries: Your flesh grows hideously thick. When not wearing armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Intelligence modifier + your Constitution modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Winged Glide
entries: You grow bat-like skin flaps that you use to glide. When you fall at least 10 feet and aren't incapacitated, you can subtract up to 100 feet from your fall when you calculate fall damage, and you can move horizontally 2 feet for every 1 foot you fall.

optionalfeature.name: Arachnoid Grip
entries: Your hands and feet secrete a sticky substance. You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed, you can climb difficult surfaces without needing to make an ability check.
Also, creatures have disadvantage on ability checks or saving throws they make to escape being grappled by you.

optionalfeature.name: Greater Physique
entries: Magic forcefully enlarges your body, giving you hideous size. You grow by one size (for example, from Medium to Large), your reach increases by 5 feet, your weight is multiplied by eight, and melee weapon attacks deal a bonus 1d4 damage.

optionalfeature.name: Vestigial Limb
entries: You grow an additional grotesque limb that resembles your other limbs in a place of your choice. It can perform any task your limbs can including the ability to use weapons, shields, magic items, tools, and other objects.

optionalfeature.name: Avian Flight
entries: A pair of feathered or leathery wings sprout forth from your back. You gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed.

optionalfeature.name: Hideous Regeneration
entries: If you begin your turn with less than half of your hit points remaining, but at least 1 hit point, you instantly regain hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1).

optionalfeature.name: Close Shot
entries: When you make a ranged attack with your Arcane Firearm while you have a hostile creature within 5 feet of you, you do not have disadvantage on your attack roll.

optionalfeature.name: Deadly Accuracy
entries: You gain a +2 bonus to your Arcane Firearm attack rolls. This Upgrade does not stack with the Archery Fighting Style.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Shot
entries: As a bonus action, you can touch your Arcane Firearm and expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher and choose either acid, cold, fire, lighting, or poison. For the next minute, your Arcane Firearm deals additional damage of that type on hit.
The elemental damage is 1d4 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus an additional 1d4 for each spell slot level above 1st.

optionalfeature.name: Grooved Barrel
entries: You modify your Arcane Firearm to be especially accurate. You ignore the disadvantage imposed on Arcane Firearm attacks that you make at the weapon's long range.

optionalfeature.name: High Caliber
entries: You increase the firepower of the Arcane Firearm. Its range increases to (100/400), its damage die increases from 1d10 to 2d6, and it gains the heavy and two-handed properties.

optionalfeature.name: Replaceable Parts
entries: Your Arcane Firearm is crafted so you can adjust it on the fly. You can spend 10 minutes using smith's tools to replace one of your Arcane Firearm's Upgrades with another Upgrade that you meet the prerequisites for. You can do so during a short rest.

optionalfeature.name: Blinding Rounds
entries: Once per turn when you hit a target with an Arcane Firearm attack, you can force it to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is blinded until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Concussive Rounds
entries: Once per turn when you hit a target with an Arcane Firearm attack, you can force it to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target cannot take reactions, and its speed is halved until the beginning of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Rounds
entries: Once per turn when you hit a target with an Arcane Firearm attack, you can force all creatures within 5 feet of it to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take damage as if they had also been hit by your Arcane Firearm attack.

optionalfeature.name: Incapacitating Rounds

optionalfeature.name: Anchor Model
entries: As an action, the Automaton latches onto a target within 5 feet, reducing the target's speed by a number of feet equal to 5 times your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 5 feet). The Automaton can still be targeted by attacks while attached.
As an action, a creature can make a Strength check against your Spell save DC, removing the Automaton on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Arcane Model
entries: When you cast an Artificer spell, you can choose for the spell to originate from this Automaton, instead of yourself, so long as you are within 60 feet of the Automaton.
This Automaton's Slam attack also deals force damage.

optionalfeature.name: Artisan Model
entries: The Automaton is proficient with one set of tools, which you choose upon its creation. As an action, it can use the tools to make an ability check and add your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of +1) to the result of its ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Assault Model

optionalfeature.name: Amphibian Model
entries: The Automaton gains a 30-foot swimming speed, and while it is swimming it has advantage on its Slam attack rolls.

optionalfeature.name: Arachnid Model
entries: The Automaton gains a 30-foot climbing speed, and it can climb on difficult surfaces, including sheer walls and upside down on ceilings, without making an ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Archer Model
entries: When this Automaton makes a Slam attack, it can choose to make it a ranged weapon attack against a target that it can see within 60 feet. On hit, it deals piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Armor Model
entries: As an action, the Automaton attaches itself to one willing creature within 5 feet, granting it a bonus to Armor Class equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1). The Automaton can still be targeted by attacks while attached.
The Automaton can detach from the target as an action.

optionalfeature.name: Avenger Model
entries: When a creature within 25 feet of the Automaton attacks or forces another creature to make a saving throw, you can use a reaction to order this Automaton to move up to its walking speed and make a Slam attack against that creature. On hit, this attack deals a bonus 1d6 bludgeoning damage.

optionalfeature.name: Avian Model

entries.name: The Artificer
entries: 一个头发花白的侏儒弯腰在他的工作台前，小心地调整着会驱动他创造物的发条机械。在他面前摆放着一个由精巧铁制齿轮构成的自动人偶，穿着一套铁甲，造型酷似一个巨大的侏儒。当这位微小的发明家将他标志性的秘银胡须固定在面甲上时，一道电蓝色的魔法闪过自动人偶。随着一个犀利的动作，钢铁卫士坐直了，等待着它的创造者的第一个命令。
哥布林小心翼翼地沿着他用有毒烟雾和酸液装置陷阱的隧道前行。这已经是他的部落今年第三次搬迁地洞，以避免被冒险队抢劫，这位富有创造力的哥布林决心保护最新的家园地洞。他相信这一次他会阻止那些总是找到他家的冒险者。
一位年轻的人类女性，身穿精美衣服，外面披着皮围裙，她展示了刚刚附魔过的钢铁护手。当她握紧拳头时，护手释放出一道耀眼的薰衣草色闪电，摧毁了房间对面的桌子。尘埃落定后，她将护手固定在她已经完整的奥术盔甲上。当她向父亲展示这件最新的作品时，他终将不得不表现出对她的认可。

entries.name: Masters of Innovation
entries: 在追求创新方面毫不妥协，制造师们以他们无尽的好奇心和愿意冒险推动奥术发明的极限而著称。对于大多数制造师来说，他们把个人价值寄托在他们实验的成果上，他们认为掌握所选择工艺的基础是通往真正伟大的第一步。
每位制造者的内心深处，目标都是发现一项新的开创性发明，无论是魔法还是其他。有些制造者是工程师，是科学和战争的学生，他们运用自己丰富的智慧来构建用魔法增强的致命武器。另一些人将自己视为艺术家，将奥术魔法的严格公式与自己专业工具和法术的工匠之感相结合。

entries.name: Fierce Rivalries
entries: 几乎每个工匠都有一个对手，往往是另一个工匠，他们努力在每一个转折点超越对方。这种激烈的竞争是一些工匠的唯一动力，超越对手比他们从发现中获得的任何名声或财富更有价值。许多人愿意冒一切去在对手之前取得新突破。
同样地，持有相似理念和目标的铸师们经常会结成松散的工匠行会。他们分享见解和发现，希望通过集中资源和团队合作来保持领先于竞争对手的位置。然而，即使在一起工作时，大多数铸师们也会保护他们认为可能导致突破性发现的任何见解。

entries.name: Creating Your Artificer
entries: 在创建一名铸师时，要考虑他们的背景和对冒险的动力。他们的对手是谁，是什么事件开始了他们的仇恨？你的铸师与教授他们基本工艺的工匠有什么关系？他们是否属于某个行会？铸师在战役世界中扮演什么角色？所有主要城市中是否存在铸师行会，或者你是第一个追求奥术发明之路的人？
最重要的是，你的(`artifice`)是什么样子的？并不是所有的奥术发明者都使用齿轮和润滑油。你的(`artificer`)是一个学习巫婆使用奇异魔法将骨头图腾注入奥术能量的学生吗？或者，你是一个雕刻着精致的精灵符文在木制法杖和长棍上的附魔师吗？
